Welcome to my website!

I'm a PhD candidate at the department of [Business Economics and Public Policy](https://kelley.iu.edu/faculty-research/departments/business-economics-public-policy/index.cshtml), [Kelley School of Business](https://kelley.iu.edu/), [Indiana University Bloomington](https://indiana.edu/).

I was also an exchange student at [Smith School of Business](https://smith.queensu.ca/index.php), [Queen's University](https://www.queensu.ca/). -->

My research interests span a variety of topics in health economics, with a particular focus on provider behavior and healthcare finance.
